author: joeyaiello
body:
<!-- PR checklist -->
- [ ] Resolves issue #xyz.
- [ ] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](../docs).

<!-- Provide more details about the PR below -->

This PR brings in the demo outlines that have been sourced from across the team and signed off. Assuming everything is good with this PR, the next steps are for people to start writing the actuall PowerShell scripts underneath the available comments and make sure that they work with PowerShell Core as it currently exists.
title: Bring in comment-level demos
